Metric_Description: Language(s) used within the datasets.
Evaluation_Rule: {'type': 'presence', 'description': 'Resource Language is present'}

Metric_Description: Language in which the metadata elements are expressed
Evaluation_Rule: {'type': 'presence', 'description': 'Metadata language is present'}

Metric_Description: Default language OR one of the alternate languages is English
Evaluation_Rule: {'type': 'comparison', 'referenceValue': 'eng', 'operator': 'is', 'description': 'Default language of the Metadata OR one of its alternate languages is English'}

Metric_Description: For how many days availability statistics and interruptions are calculated
Evaluation_Rule: {'type': 'presence', 'description': 'Checks presence'}

Metric_Description: For how many days response time metrics are calculated
Evaluation_Rule: {'type': 'presence', 'descripiton': 'Checks presence'}

Metric_Description: Service ID
Evaluation_Rule: {'type': 'presence', 'description': 'Checks presence'}

Metric_Description: Contains the number of milliseconds the service has been in 'ok' state during the period
Evaluation_Rule: {'type': 'presence', 'description': 'Check presence of measure'}

Metric_Description: Contains the number of milliseconds the service has been in 'ok' state during the period
Evaluation_Rule: {'type': 'presence', 'description': 'Check presence of measure'}

Metric_Description: Contains the number of milliseconds the service has been in 'ok' state during the period
Evaluation_Rule: {'type': 'presence', 'description': 'Check presence of measure'}

Metric_Description: Contains the number of milliseconds the service has been in available (meaning ok or in maintenance state) during the period
Evaluation_Rule: {'type': 'comparison', 'referenceValue': 0.95, 'operator': '>', 'description': 'We assume the service should be available state at least 95% of the time from when the statistics are calculated. Availability = (ok + maintenance) / (ok + down + maintenance)'}

Metric_Description: The length in milliseconds of the longest interruption during or overlapping 'daysOfAvailabilityMetrics'
Evaluation_Rule: {'type': 'comparison', 'referenceValue': 86400000, 'operator': '<', 'description': 'We assume it should be at most 24h. Null if no monitoring data is available for the period.'}

Metric_Description: The average length of service interruptions during or overlapping 'daysOfAvailabilityMetrics'
Evaluation_Rule: {'type': 'comparison', 'referenceValue': 43200000, 'operator': '<', 'description': 'We assume it should be at most 12h. Null if no monitoring data is available for the period.'}

Metric_Description: Average response time (in milliseconds) of service during 'daysOfResponseTimeMetrics'.
Evaluation_Rule: {'type': 'comparison', 'referenceValue': 21600000, 'operator': '<', 'description': 'We assume it should be at most 6h. Null if no monitoring data is available for the period.'}

Metric_Description: Timestamp of latest monitoring request (in milliseconds since epoch).
Evaluation_Rule: {'type': 'presence', 'description': 'Check presence of timestamp. Null if no monitoring data is available for the period.'}

Metric_Description: Response time (in milliseconds) of the latest monitoring request.
Evaluation_Rule: {'type': 'range', 'minimum': 0, 'maximum': 3600000, 'description': 'We assume it should be at most 1h. Null if no monitoring data is available for the period.'}

Metric_Description: URL of the service endpoint in question
Evaluation_Rule: {'type': 'presence', 'description': 'Check presence of URL.'}

Metric_Description: Type of service (WMS, WFS, WMTS, ArcGIS, REST, or INSPIRE_ATOM)
Evaluation_Rule: {'type': 'presence', 'description': 'Check presence of type of service.'}

Metric_Description: Version of service endpoint (newest supported version in case of OGC services
Evaluation_Rule: {'type': 'presence', 'description': 'Check presence of version.'}

Metric_Description: Indication of omission
Evaluation_Rule: {'type': 'presence', 'description': 'Checks indication of omission'}

Metric_Description: Number of missing item
Evaluation_Rule: {'type': 'comparison', 'referenceValue': 1000, 'operator': '<', 'description': 'We assume it should be at most 1000 (number chosen randomly, user input parameter ?).'}

Metric_Description: Proportion of missing item
Evaluation_Rule: {'type': 'comparison', 'referenceValue': 15, 'operator': '<', 'description': 'We assume it should be at most 15% (user input parameter ?).'}

Metric_Description: Number of duplicate item
Evaluation_Rule: {'type': 'comparison', 'referenceValue': 100, 'operator': '<', 'description': 'We assume it should be at most 100 (number chosen randomly, user input parameter ?).'}

Metric_Description: Date of last evaluation
Evaluation_Rule: {'type': 'date', 'minimum': '2000-01-01', 'maximum': '2023-01-01', 'description': 'Should be between 2000-01-01 and 2023-01-01 (defined by user)'}

Metric_Description: Attribute value uncertainty at 68,3 % significance level
Evaluation_Rule: {'type': 'comparison', 'referenceValue': 0.5, 'operator': '>', 'description': 'Half length of the interval defined by an upper and a lower limit, in which the true value for the quantitative attribute lies with probability 68,3 % ; LE68.3 (ISO19157, Table D.78)'}

Metric_Description: Attribute value uncertainty at 95 % significance level
Evaluation_Rule: {'type': 'comparison', 'referenceValue': 0.5, 'operator': '>', 'description': 'Half length of the interval defined by an upper and a lower limit, in which the true value for the quantitative attribute lies with probability 95 % ; LE95 (ISO19157, Table D.81)'}

Metric_Description: Date of last evaluation
Evaluation_Rule: {'type': 'date', 'minimum': '2000-01-01', 'maximum': '2023-01-01', 'description': 'Should be between 2000-01-01 and 2023-01-01 (defined by user)'}

Metric_Description: Proportion of missclassification for non-quantitative attributes
Evaluation_Rule: {'type': 'comparison', 'referenceValue': 15, 'operator': '<', 'description': 'We assume it should be at most 15% (user input parameter ?).'}

Metric_Description: Missclassification count for non-quantitative attributes
Evaluation_Rule: {'type': 'comparison', 'referenceValue': 100, 'operator': '<', 'description': 'We assume it should be at most 100 (number chosen randomly, user input parameter ?).'}

Metric_Description: Date of last Evaluation.
Evaluation_Rule: {'type': 'date', 'minimum': '2000-01-01', 'maximum': '2023-01-01', 'description': 'Should be between 2000-01-01 and 2023-01-01 (defined by user)'}

Metric_Description: Proportion of incorrectly classified item
Evaluation_Rule: {'type': 'comparison', 'referenceValue': 15, 'operator': '<', 'description': 'We assume it should be at most 15% (user input parameter ?).'}

Metric_Description: Number of item with incorrect classification
Evaluation_Rule: {'type': 'comparison', 'referenceValue': 100, 'operator': '<', 'description': 'We assume it should be at most 100 (number chosen randomly, user input parameter ?).'}

Metric_Description: The feature must follow OGC Valid principles.
Evaluation_Rule: {'type': 'comparison', 'operator': '<', 'referenceValue': 1000, 'description': 'The feature do not follow OGC Valid principles. Checks count of such errors.'}

Metric_Description: The feature must follow OGC Simple principles.
Evaluation_Rule: {'type': 'comparison', 'operator': '<', 'referenceValue': 1000, 'description': 'The feature do not follow OGC Simple principles. Checks count of such errors.'}

Metric_Description: The feature must have a vertex normals.
Evaluation_Rule: {'type': 'comparison', 'operator': '<', 'referenceValue': 50, 'description': 'The feature has no vertex normals. Checks count of such errors.'}

Metric_Description: All normals of the faces must be logically oriented.
Evaluation_Rule: {'type': 'comparison', 'operator': '<', 'referenceValue': 50, 'description': 'Is the every surface of the feature logically oriented based on vertex normals and depending on the feature type? Checks count of such errors.'}

Metric_Description: The value of the attribute XXX must be in the allowed range (A-N). Allowed ranges were derived from OGC CityGML Encoding Standard.
Evaluation_Rule: {'type': 'comparison', 'operator': '<', 'referenceValue': 10, 'description': 'At least X attribute(s) is/are not in allowed range. Checks count of such errors.'}

Metric_Description: Geometries must be either 2D or 3D, not both.
Evaluation_Rule: {'type': 'comparison', 'operator': '<', 'referenceValue': 1, 'description': 'Does the feature have a mixture of 2D and 3D parts? Checks count of such errors.'}

Metric_Description: The coordinate reference system must be 3D.
Evaluation_Rule: {'type': 'comparison', 'operator': '<', 'referenceValue': 1, 'description': 'Is the coordinate reference system 3D? Checks count of such errors.'}

Metric_Description: Data type of attribute information XXX must be valid.
Evaluation_Rule: {'type': 'comparison', 'operator': '<', 'referenceValue': 5, 'description': 'At least X attribute(s) has/have a wrong data type. Checks count of such errors.'}

Metric_Description: Overlapping area of two features must be smaller than 5 % of their areas.
Evaluation_Rule: {'type': 'comparison', 'operator': '<', 'referenceValue': 50, 'description': 'Is the GroundSurface overlapping with the GroundSurface of another Building? ? Checks count of such errors.'}

Metric_Description: The geometry must be valid.
Evaluation_Rule: {'type': 'comparison', 'operator': '<', 'referenceValue': 50, 'description': 'Does the geometry contain degenerated or corrupted geometries? Checks count of such errors.'}

Metric_Description: The face or BoundarySurface must be planar.
Evaluation_Rule: {'type': 'comparison', 'operator': '<', 'referenceValue': 50, 'description': 'Is the Face or BoundarySurface planar based on thickness or normal deviation? Checks count of such errors.'}

Metric_Description: The minimum height of the roof cannot be smaller than minimum height of the ground.
Evaluation_Rule: {'type': 'comparison', 'operator': '<', 'referenceValue': 50, 'description': 'Checks count of such errors.'}

Metric_Description: The maximum height of the floor cannot be smaller than maximum height of the roof.
Evaluation_Rule: {'type': 'comparison', 'operator': '<', 'referenceValue': 50, 'description': 'Checks count of such errors.'}

Metric_Description: The feature contains spikes, which angle or length exceeds the given tolerance.
Evaluation_Rule: {'type': 'comparison', 'operator': '<', 'referenceValue': 50, 'description': 'The feature cannot contain spikes less than X degrees and/or Y meters (user ?).'}

Metric_Description: The area of the face must be at least X mÂ².
Evaluation_Rule: {'type': 'comparison', 'operator': '>', 'referenceValue': 50, 'description': 'The area of the face must be at least X mÂ² (user request? / user parameter in FME)'}

Metric_Description: The volume of the solid cannot be smaller than X m3.
Evaluation_Rule: {'type': 'comparison', 'operator': '>', 'referenceValue': 50, 'description': 'The volume of the solid must be greater than X m3. (user request? / user parameter in FME)'}

Metric_Description: The surface must have a valid orientation.
Evaluation_Rule: {'type': 'comparison', 'operator': '<', 'referenceValue': 50, 'description': 'The surfaces cannot have an incorrect orientation.'}

Metric_Description: The solid must have a valid orientation.
Evaluation_Rule: {'type': 'comparison', 'operator': '<', 'referenceValue': 50, 'description': 'The solids cannot have an incorrect orientation.'}

Metric_Description: The areas must have a valid orientation.
Evaluation_Rule: {'type': 'comparison', 'operator': '<', 'referenceValue': 50, 'description': 'Do Areas, such as polygons, ellipses, and donuts, have an correct orientation? The area cannot have an incorrect orientation.'}

Metric_Description: The feature must be self-closure based on its starting and ending points.
Evaluation_Rule: {'type': 'comparison', 'operator': '<', 'referenceValue': 50, 'description': 'The feature is not self-closure.'}

Metric_Description: The solid must be valid.
Evaluation_Rule: {'type': 'comparison', 'operator': '<', 'referenceValue': 50, 'description': 'The solid cannot contain problems.'}

Metric_Description: The vertices of the feature must be correctly connected
Evaluation_Rule: {'type': 'comparison', 'operator': '<', 'referenceValue': 50000, 'description': 'The feature cannot intersect itself.'}

Metric_Description: The solid boundaries must be valid.
Evaluation_Rule: {'type': 'comparison', 'operator': '<', 'referenceValue': 50, 'description': 'The solid boundaries cannot be invalid.'}

Metric_Description: Time accuracy at 90 % significance level
Evaluation_Rule: {'type': 'comparison', 'referenceValue': 0.5, 'operator': '>', 'description': 'Half length of the interval defined by an upper and a lower limit, in which the true value for the time instance lies with probability 90 %; LE90 (ISO19157, Table D.63)'}

Metric_Description: Time accuracy at 99,8 % significance level
Evaluation_Rule: {'type': 'comparison', 'referenceValue': 0.5, 'operator': '>', 'description': 'Half length of the interval defined by an upper and a lower limit, in which the true value for the time instance lies with probability 99.8 %; LE99.8 (ISO19157, Table D.67)'}

Metric_Description: Date of creation
Evaluation_Rule: {'type': 'date', 'minimum': '2015-01-01', 'maximum': '2023-01-01', 'description': 'Date of creation should be included in user requested period'}

Metric_Description: Date of publication
Evaluation_Rule: {'type': 'date', 'minimum': '2016-01-01', 'maximum': '2023-01-01', 'description': 'Date of publication should be included in user requested period'}

Metric_Description: Date of revision declared in the Metadata
Evaluation_Rule: {'type': 'date', 'minimum': '2022-01-01', 'maximum': '2023-01-01', 'description': 'Date of last revision should be included in user requested period'}

Metric_Description: Checks that the requested maintenance frequency by the user matches the declared maintenance frequency
Evaluation_Rule: {'type': 'comparison', 'referenceValue': 'continual', 'operator': 'is', 'description': 'Should return true if matches user request of maintenance requency. Should be implemented when requests on dahsboard can be personnalized.'}

Metric_Description: Mean value of positionnal uncertainty of the dataset
Evaluation_Rule: {'type': 'range', 'minimum': 0, 'maximum': 0.8, 'description': 'Mean value of positionnal uncertainty should be between 0m and 0.8m (user request)'}

Metric_Description: A comparison of the data (measured) and the control (true). Calculation method of the Relative LE (Rel LE90): see ISO19157-3, Table D.59
Evaluation_Rule: {'type': 'range', 'minimum': 0, 'maximum': 0.9, 'description': 'The vertical relative error should be between x and x (user request)'}

Metric_Description: A comparison of the data (measured) and the control (true). Calculation method of the Relative LE (Rel CE90): see ISO19157-3, Table D.60
Evaluation_Rule: {'type': 'range', 'minimum': 0, 'maximum': 0.9, 'description': 'The horizontal relative error should be between x and x (user request)'}

Metric_Description: Radius describing a circle, in which the true point location lies with the probability of a normal distribution at 39,4 % (see ISO19157-3, Table D.49)
Evaluation_Rule: {'type': 'range', 'minimum': 0, 'maximum': 0.9, 'description': 'The circular standard deviation should be between x and x (user request)'}

Metric_Description: Radius of a circle around the given point, in which the true value lies with probability P [ISO 19157-3:2021].s
Evaluation_Rule: {'type': 'comparison', 'referenceValue': 20, 'operator': '<', 'description': 'The circular standard deviation should be under 20m (user request)'}

Metric_Description: Level of detail expressed as the scale denominator of a comparable hardcopy map or chart. Each spatialResoultion element must contain either an equivalent scale or a distance but not both
Evaluation_Rule: {'type': 'range', 'minimum': 490, 'maximum': 510, 'description': 'Map scale should be between 1/4900 and 1/5100 (user request).'}

Metric_Description: Ground sample distance. Each 'spatialResoultion' element must contain either an equivalent scale or a distance but not both
Evaluation_Rule: {'type': 'range', 'minimum': 15, 'maximum': 20, 'description': 'Distance should be between 15-20m (user request).'}
